alert.note: Alert for Dyer; Lauderdale (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 3:31PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Dyer and northeastern Lauderdale Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 331 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Heloise, or 13 miles west of Dyersburg, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dyersburg, Halls, Bradleytown, Unionville, South Fork, Poplar Grove, Middle City, Papaw Ridge, Porter Gap, Fowlkes, South Dyersburg, Double Bridges, Jenkinsville, Big Boy Junction, Mengelwood, Tylersville, Finley, Stinger, Tiger Tail and Evansville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
